title: How to Contact the World Health Organization (WHO)

steps.title: Call +41-22-7912111 for the WHO headquarters, in Geneva, Switzerland.
steps.content: Call +41-22-7912111 for the WHO headquarters, in Geneva, Switzerland. This is the main phone number for the WHO headquarters. You can call this phone number for any questions that you may have. You may have to pay long-distance charges to call this number if you do not live in Switzerland.

steps.title: Contact the WHO regional offices for local assistance.
steps.content: Contact the WHO regional offices for local assistance. If you want to contact a local office, or if you cannot pay long-distance calling fees, you can contact a regional office for help. The phone numbers for the WHO regional offices are listed below: Call +1 (202) 974-3000 for the WHO Americas regional office. This office is in Washington D.C. in the United States of America. steps.title: Navigate to the online contact form.
steps.content: Navigate to the online contact form.

steps.title: Enter your name into the "your name" box.
steps.content: Enter your name into the "your name" box. This is optional, but it will allow the WHO to address you in any response.

steps.title: Type your email address into the "Your e-mail address" box.
steps.content: Type your email address into the "Your e-mail address" box.

steps.title: Select your country in the "Where you live/country of residence" drop-down menu.
steps.content: Select your country in the "Where you live/country of residence" drop-down menu. This is optional, but it will allow the WHO to give you more accurate information for your location.

steps.title: Select your occupation in the "Your area/field of work" drop-down menu.
steps.content: Select your occupation in the "Your area/field of work" drop-down menu. This is optional, but it allows the WHO to answer your question in a more personalized way.

steps.title: Write the subject in the "Subject of the request" box.
steps.content: Write the subject in the "Subject of the request" box. This box is like the subject line of an email.

steps.title: Enter the URL of the page on the WHO website that you are asking about in the "Please indicate the internet address of the web site/page you refer to" box.
steps.content: Enter the URL of the page on the WHO website that you are asking about in the "Please indicate the internet address of the web site/page you refer to" box. Use this box to tell the WHO which page you want to know more information about.

steps.title: Write your question or questions in the "Your message" box.
steps.content: Write your question or questions in the "Your message" box.

steps.title: Click Submit the form.
steps.content: Click Submit the form . This will send your message to the WHO.

steps.title: Write a letter to the WHO.
steps.content: Write a letter to the WHO. You can send a letter to the WHO headquarters. Their address is: WHO Headquarters in Geneva Avenue Appia 20 1211 Geneva .

steps.title: Email erecruit@who.int for questions about employment opportunities.
steps.content: Email erecruit@who.int for questions about employment opportunities. If you want a job at the WHO, first visit their page . If you have any questions that the page does not answer, then you can email this address.

steps.title: Email mediainquiries@who.int for media inquiries.
steps.content: Email mediainquiries@who.int for media inquiries. If you are a journalist and you want a comment from the WHO about a story, then you can request one at this email address.

steps.title: Contact the WHO on Facebook.
steps.content: Contact the WHO on Facebook. To message the WHO on Facebook, visit their profile page , and then click on the Message button.
